overview: Desaparecer / Disappear: to stop being in sight or in a place, cease to exist. In Mexico one person disappears every 1 hour and 50 minutes, that is, 13 people a day. Through the use of landscape and self portrait, we explore the ephemeral quality of image and physical presence.  Codirection: Manuel Trujillo  Production format: 16m  (Text from Canyon Cinema)
title: Desaparecer
